product_name: Jade Fusion Yoga Mat - Midnight Blue
long_description: The extra-thick Jade Fusion yoga mat is ideal for all kinds of workouts, including yoga, pilates and core fitness practice. At 0.3-in. thick, the Fusion mat provides excellent traction, cushioning and stability. Constructed of open-cell natural rubber, a renewable resource from rubber trees; mat contains no PVC or ozone-depleting substances. Natural rubber provides excellent slip resistance even when wet with perspiration. Hand wash mat with mild soap and warm water; hang or lay flat to dry out of direct sunlight.
short_description: The extra-thick Jade Fusion yoga mat is ideal for all kinds of workouts, including yoga, pilates and core fitness practice.
